title: REG-Granite Mortgages 04/3 PLC FRN Variable Rate Fix
content:
FRN Variable Rate Fix 
 
 
 Re:  GRANITE MORTGAGES 04-3 PLC    EUR 74,400,000.00    MATURING: 20-Sep-2044    ISIN: XS0201483657       PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT THE INTEREST RATE FOR THE PERIOD 21-Sep-2015 
          TO 21-Dec-2015  HAS BEEN FIXED AT 0.52 PCT     DAY BASIS: ACTUAL/360     INTEREST PAYABLE VALUE 21-Dec-2015 WILL AMOUNT TO:  EUR 25.36 PER EUR 19,186.00 DENOMINATION  
 
 

 
View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150918005754/en/
